snippet: Lawyers for the Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev asked a judge on Wednesday to lift restrictions placed on him in prison.
abstract: Lawyers for Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev ask a judge to lift restrictions placed on him in prison, arguing that they have left him nearly totally isolated and are impairing their ability to defend him.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev asked a judge on Wednesday to lift restrictions placed on him in prison.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Lawyers Seek End to Restrictions on Bombing Suspect
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Lawyers Seek End To Restrictions On Bombing Suspect
